jde.wizards
Class ImportWizard

java.lang.Object
  jde.wizards.ImportWizard

public class ImportWizard
extends java.lang.Object

Converts an unqualified class name to import statements by scanning through the classpath.

Version:
1.0 - 6 May 1999
Author:
Len Trigg (trigg@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
